last_episode_to_air.name: Full Bloom
last_episode_to_air.overview: Committed to a long term relationship, Haebom and Taeseong confront their mother together about their feelings for each other.

name: Cherry Blossoms After Winter
overview: The death of his parents forces a seven-year-old boy named Seo Hae Bom to move in with an adoptive family who have a young son of the same age named Jo Tae Seong. Seo Hae Bom is in awe of Jo Tae Seong – he considers the boy to be everything that he is not: tall, handsome, popular, caring, and worthy of love and attention. The diminutive Seo Hae Bom thinks himself inferior and is humbled by the kindness of the family that took him in.

episodes.name: Hidden Feelings
episodes.overview: Seo Hae Bom discovers he will be in the same high school class as his adoptive brother, Jo Tae Seong. Also in the classroom are two bullies who repeatedly steal his money.

episodes.name: Sweet Gaze
episodes.overview: Taesung helps Haebom fight back against his bully in the class.

episodes.name: Two Hearts Grow Closer
episodes.overview: Taesung and Haebom go camping together with friends.

episodes.name: The Beginning of a Relationship
episodes.overview: Haebom and Taesung share some beers, leading to an emotional moment for Haebom who misses his parents after being orphaned.

episodes.name: An Awkward Confession, Becoming Lovers
episodes.overview: Taesung cares for Haebom after he falls ill.

episodes.name: Only One Bed
episodes.overview: Haebom and Taesung move into an apartment together close to campus.

episodes.name: A Forbidden Relationship
episodes.overview: When their mother discovers the truth about their relationship, Taesung asks her to not express her disapproval to the soft-hearted Haebom.

episodes.name: Full Bloom
episodes.overview: Committed to a long term relationship, Haebom and Taeseong confront their mother together about their feelings for each other.
